p: The level of acceptability and ranges of score were classified as follows: 4.5–5.00 = highly acceptable (HA); 3.5–4.49 = acceptable (A); 2.50–3.49 = moderately acceptable (MA); 1.5–2.49 = slightly acceptable (SA); 1.00–1.49 = not acceptable (NA). Panelists were asked to rinse their mouth with still water in between sample evaluation.
